physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The electrocardiogram showed an abnormal ST segment. Patient was dyslipidemic and hypertensive.
Coronary angiogram revealed significantly enlarged right coronary artery aneurysm; no coronary stenosis was present.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The right coronary artery aneurysm significantly enlarged compared to previous angiogram.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Soft and bluish right coronary artery aneurysm on palpation; no thrombus in the lumen observed during surgery.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Six months after surgery, complete disappearance of the aneurysm was noted with a patent anastomosis.
